and only has two Atomic operations though there's a get operation and a scan operation a get operation is when
you uh give it a certain key and then it returns all the values associated with that key and then a scan operation is
when you have a certain range of keys that you're interest in in kind of getting all of their corresponding
values but the challenge is when you're dealing with only two Atomic operations it's very difficult to link together
very complicated searches like what are all of the SSL certificates found in
China that that also have that are also shared in Mexican IP space so it's
difficult to kind of do complex combinations on hbas as a result you need to design your tables pretty
carefully and so table design also needs to take into account the backend infrastructure or the physical uh
infrastructure behind hbas so there are four major components there's an hbas Master which kind of monitors the
entirety of the cluster and then there's a region server and a client server and then a name and data node uh cluster
which sorry data node server which you're connected but the most important part is the region server because the
